name: Cook the Book: Cucumber Salad with Lemon Basil
description: Marrying the flavors of Southeast Asia with that classic American summertime staple, cucumber salad, this is the kind of salad-meets-pickle that you can easily make and tweak all spring and summer and never tire of.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh red Thai chiles
1 cup thinly sliced scallions, white and green parts
1/4 cup lemon basil, other basil, or mint leaves, torn

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together the lime juice, salt, fish sauce, sugar, and oil. Add the cucumbers and chiles, toss to combine, and let sit in the refrigerator for at least 10 and up to 30 minutes. Just before serving, add the scallions and basil. Toss again, and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
